Package logic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Collidable
    All class which implements this interface is able to collide with one another.
    Updatable
    Updatable objects have a tick() method which if called, used for updating an object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    An actor is a thing which can act and "is" on the game map.
    Camera
    The camera follows a target.
    Chalice
    The Chalice is the object, which the player has to get to.
    Constants
    These are some basic constants to keep this program up and running.
    EmptyTile
    The empty tile is like "air".
    Enemy
    An enemies goal is to kill the player.
    EnemySpawner
    Spawns an enemy periodically at its position.
    Entity
    An entity has health management and damage.
    GameClock
    The game clock updates every Updatable periodically.
    GameMap
    The game's map is a field where Actors can interact and a grid, on which the entities can move.
    GroundTile
    The ground prevents the entities to infinitely fall, giving them a solid ground to walk on.
    Main
    This class starts the program.
    Movable
    A class which extend the Movable class, will have a velocity vector attached to it.
    PistolBullet
    A player shot bullet which damages enemies if it hit them, cannot penetrate walls (gets destroyed by them).
    Player
    The player is controlled by the user.
    PlayerSpawn
    The player spawn on a game map defines where the player spawns on the start of the game.
    Tile  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActorType
    All actor types are listed here, with the path to their representing image.
    TileType
    All types of tiles are listed here with their colour and path to their representing image.
